View Javadoc

1   package org.lindbergframework.util;
2   
3   import java.util.Arrays;
4   import java.util.Comparator;
5   import java.util.List;
6   import java.util.Vector;
7   
8   
9   
10  /**
11   * Utilitary class to Array operations.
12   * 
13   * @author Victor Lindberg
14   *
15   */
16  public class ArrayUtil {
17  	
18  	/**
19  	 * Returns a array based on object varargs.
20  	 */
21  	public static  <E> E[] toArray(E... objs){
22  		return objs; 
23  	}
24  	
25  	/**
26  	 * Merges tow array on a other specified array.<br><br>
27  	 * 
28  	 * E.g.: <br><br>
29  	 * 
30  	 *  String[] a = new String[] {"aa", "bb"};
31  		String[] b = new String[] {"11", "22"};
32  		
33  		String[] c = merge(a, b, new String[a.length + b.length]);
34  		<br><br>
35  		
36  		The array <i>c</i> : {"aa", "bb", "11", "22"}
37  	 * 
38  	 * @param <E> type of elements in array.
39  	 * @param array1 array 1
40  	 * @param array2 array 2
41  	 * @param arrayToMerge array to merge.
42  	 * @return array merged.
43  	 */
44  	public static <E> E[] merge(E[] array1, E[] array2,E[] arrayToMerge){
45  		List<E> list = new Vector<E>();
46  		
47  		list.addAll(Arrays.asList(array1));
48  		list.addAll(Arrays.asList(array2));
49  		
50  		return list.toArray(arrayToMerge);
51  	}
52  	
53  	/**
54  	 * Executes the merge of tow array on a other array based on specified comparator implementation.
55  	 * 
56  	 * @param array1 array 1
57  	 * @param array2 array 2
58  	 * @param arrayToMerge array to merge
59  	 * @param comparator comparator to sort
60  	 * @return array merged.
61  	 */
62  	public static <E> E[] mergeSorting(E[] array1, E[] array2,E[] arrayToMerge, Comparator<E> comparator){
63  		E[] arrayMerged = merge(array1, array2, arrayToMerge);
64  		Arrays.sort(arrayMerged, comparator);
65  		
66  		return arrayMerged;
67  	}
68  	
69  }
